comment.author: 7278052@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Croton-on-Hudson, New York, and we'd love to have this added to the group! When we were kids, we used to have to walk past this dump on the way to the riverfront Croton Pointe Park. It stunk both figuratively and literally!

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi Libraryrivergirl,

Sure, you're welcome to add the National Archives' photos to your group.  I bet just looking at these pictures brings back olfactory memories of that walk in the middle of summer! 

Kristen (U.S. National Archives)

comment.author: 7278052@N06
comment._content: Thanks for adding the photos. Yes, it was especially awful in the summer. And we would wrap a scarf around our faces to block out the smell as we went past.
